Module it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis
Package it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.view.gui.controllers

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.view.gui.controllers.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Game extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Game is the main GUI class. It manages and displays all the graphic content used while playing.

    • updateStructures

      public void updateStructures(List<Structure> structures)
      Used to update structures. When the method is called, every card in a structure is displayed in a specif pane. On every initial card is displayed the player's pawn. The method is also used to add points for every visible resource. If the player is ready to draw, when a structure card's angle is clicked a place command is sent.
      Parameters:
      structures -

    • updateHand

      public void updateHand(List<Hand> hands)
      Used to update player's hand.
      Parameters:
      hands -

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard(Board board)
      Used to display the board. Paws images are created for every player and displayed in the correct spot according to points made.
      Parameters:
      board -

    • setInitialCard

      public void setInitialCard(InitialCard initialCard1)
      Used to display and set initial card for the player structure. When the player's turn occur and a hand card is selected, if the player click one of the available borders on the initial card it calls the place command placing the card in the correct spot.
      Parameters:
      initialCard1 -

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints(String obj, int points)
      Used to add points given the obj (e.g. "mushroom") and the points associated.
      Parameters:
